ComicInfo.Series: DC Graphic Novels for Young Adults Sneak Previews: Swamp Thing: Twin Branches
ComicInfo.Summary: In their last summer before college, twins Alec and Walker Holland leave the city to live with their rural cousins. There, they confront underlying familial tension, their diverging paths, and the devastating consequences of both.
